content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the kaunas district court the court has made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property including land plots and buildings the applicants will receive a 13 share of the assets and financial compensation the court has also ordered the defendant to pay compensation to three other applicants for their loss of inheritance and estate shares the defendant has lodged a counterclaim but the applicants disagree with it the court values the property and considers the requests made by the parties the court emphasizes the need to balance the interests of the parties and seeks to eliminate future disputes the court has ordered the party who won the judgment to pay the costs incurred by the other party the court has also made a decision regarding the division of community property and awarded assets to the applicants the defendant has been ordered to pay compensation to the applicants for the loss of their share in the inheritance or estate the court has dismissed the remainder of the application and counterclaim the defendant has been ordered to pay the costs of sending procedural documents and the applicants have been ordered to pay a portion of these costs as well

metadata.cost: 3'208.14 EUR (professional fees) + 23.01 EUR (court fees) to be borne by the defendant
